com.turnout.ws.service

Class FriendsServiceImplTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.service.FriendsServiceImplTest

  • public class FriendsServiceImplTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a testing class for FriendsServiceImpl.So here, we mock that class to write test cases and validate generated output are same as expected for given input. All methods are mocking FriendsServiceImpl methods and it does not return any value.

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method to be run before the Test method.So several tests need similar objects created before they can run.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - MockitoException It throws when runtime errors happens while testing.

      • testShouldAddfollower

        public void testShouldAddfollower()
        This test case will test addfollower method. It should add a new friend to user friend list.

      • testGetFriendsList

        public void testGetFriendsList()
        This test case should test getFriendsList method. It should return list of friends to whom current user has followed already.

      • testFindFriends

        public void testFindFriends()
        This test case should test findFriends method. While we search party with their name, it should return list of parties who are not actively friends.
